page.title: 06HOMES
page.content:
My house is 16 years old.The garden is about a quarter of an acre,it has got 7 rooms,a study,my bedroom,mum's and dad's bedroom ,bathroom,living room,kitchen and toilet,one garage,3 lofts and one hall. It is made of concrete blocks.It is white,but the wood is black.
My house has three bedrooms'two bathrooms,one kitchen,one living room,one sitting room. It has stairs. We are buying our house but very slowly. I have my own bedroom.We have two woodburners. Every room has wallpaper on. It has an attic. The roof is slate. We have a front and back garden.
